TopicTitle: Crash druing UnityPreload, when doing AudioClip::Transfer

Articles.Content:
This crash happens often and constantly on my mac, build 1.0.5.1028

I can provide more info and can debug any issue.

Doesn't look like a KSP log, can you find the Player.log in the library the next time this happens please.
